song.englishname: Story About a Man With a Bad Heart

english.segment1: Watch your makeup, There is just a smudge beneath the eye. You look great in that dress, It hits every curve just right. We've got dinner at eight, and then drinks by nine. I love you so, it's our anniversary tonight.
english.segment2: Suddenly everything shakes as if it's starting to break. And now I'm on my knees, My wife screams, "What's Wrong!?". As the stereo plays our song, Only in Dreams.
english.segment3: Just last Friday is when my heart failed again. I was thinking that I should find a friend, I bought her several drinks, And slipped the ring into my hand. We drove to her place. And let the good times roll again.
english.segment4: Suddenly everything shakes as my protection breaks. And now I'm on my knees, And I scream, "This was wrong!". As I leave, the stereo plays the song, The Finishing.
english.segment5: Is this it? Is this how I have spent my life?. Lying there with a broken heart on bedroom floors. And finally, finally I realize, I realize I'm only a man.
english.segment6: One thing I have to know, where did the miracles go?. And if a simple man believes, Will it start again with me?
english.segment7: If I were the maker I would fashion out a blade. To cut out every inch of dead heart I've made.
